personal.name: Muhammad Zulfikri
personal.title: Frontend Developer
personal.subtitle: UI/UX Enthusiast
personal.bio: With over 7 years in the tech industry, I've evolved from a fullstack developer into a frontend specialist who truly loves crafting user interfaces that just feel right. My journey has taken me through diverse projects at companies like Nawatech, Jejakin, and PT Solman Manunggal Informatika, where I've learned that great frontend development isn't just about making things look good—it's about creating experiences that users actually enjoy using.

items.title: Maindealers
items.description: An enterprise-grade motorcycle sales ecosystem with multi-channel chatbot integration (WhatsApp + embeddable web widgets). Features white-label solutions for dealer partners, campaign-driven QR code generation, and seamless data injection capabilities across three interconnected applications designed to scale customer acquisition.
highlights: Web Console (React) - Campaign management with QR code generation for customer acquisition
Multi-channel Chatbot - Qiscus integration for WhatsApp + embeddable web widget for dealer websites
Product Catalog (Next.js) - Interactive motorcycle showcase with installment simulation
White-label solution: Embeddable chatbot with custom data injection for dealer partners
Integrated customer journey: QR scan → Chatbot → Catalog → Lead capture
Cross-application data flow for seamless user experience and prospect tracking

items.title: Nawatech Internal Management System
items.description: A comprehensive enterprise-grade internal management platform built for Nawatech to centralize all company operations. Features Azure AD SSO integration for seamless employee authentication and supports advanced project management with MPP file uploads for Microsoft Project integration.
highlights: Azure AD SSO integration for seamless company-wide authentication
Project Management with MPP file upload support for Microsoft Project
Task Management system with assignment and tracking capabilities
Leave Management with approval workflows and calendar integration
Employee Management with role-based access control
Timesheet tracking with project allocation and reporting

items.description: Leading frontend development initiatives with a focus on modern React applications and user experience optimization. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable web solutions that serve thousands of users daily.

Developed responsive web applications using React and modern frontend technologies. Worked closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces while maintaining excellent performance and accessibility standards.
Enhanced existing applications and built new features using various programming languages and frameworks. Mentored junior developers and contributed to technical decision-making processes.

Started my professional journey developing both frontend and backend solutions. Built web applications from concept to deployment, gaining valuable experience in the complete software development lifecycle.

items.title: Microsoft Build AI Day 2024
items.description: Led the first-ever offline GitHub Copilot Hackathon in Indonesia with 150+ participants as part of Microsoft Build: AI Day keynote by Satya Nadella at Jakarta Convention Center. Nawatech served as the trusted local partner, revolutionizing coding practices through AI-driven development and empowering participants with newfound confidence in AI-powered coding tools.

items.title: Pertamina In-Person Workshop & Hackathon
items.description: Organized and led an in-person hackathon and workshop for Pertamina Hulu Rokan in collaboration with Microsoft, diving deep into GitHub Copilot and Microsoft Fabrics technologies. Successfully fostered innovation and explored cutting-edge technologies with Indonesia's leading energy company, pushing the boundaries of technology integration in the energy sector.

items.title: GitHub Copilot Hackathon with PT Kereta Api Indonesia
items.description: Hosted and mentored GitHub Copilot Hackathon for PT Kereta Api Indonesia (Persero), empowering developers to explore AI-powered coding solutions and tackle real-world railway industry challenges. Successfully guided teams through optimizing workflows, driving automation, and showcasing the transformative potential of AI-driven development collaboration in Indonesia's national railway system.

items.title: GitHub Copilot Hands-on Workshop for PT. Pegadaian
items.description: Led PT. Pegadaian's development team through an intensive hands-on GitHub Copilot workshop, empowering innovation with AI-powered coding assistance. Focused on boosting productivity, simplifying complex coding tasks, and sharing practical techniques to maximize AI potential in software development. Successfully helped Indonesia's largest pawn company embrace cutting-edge AI tools and elevate their development capabilities to the next level.

items.title: GitHub Copilot Hackathon at Microsoft Indonesia
items.description: Facilitated a successful GitHub Copilot Hackathon at the Microsoft Indonesia office, empowering Astra Group's developers to advance their coding skills and productivity. Collaborated with Microsoft to explain the immense benefits of GitHub Copilot, helping participants transform their coding practices through AI-powered development tools. Successfully supported one of Indonesia's largest conglomerates in their journey towards more advanced and efficient coding practices.

items.title: Kemenkeu GovAI Hackathon
items.description: Contributed to the groundbreaking GovAI Hackathon themed 'Catching the Dream' organized by Kementerian Keuangan Republik Indonesia with Microsoft, focusing on human-centered generative AI in governance and policymaking. Supported participants through multiple days of training and innovation, helping deliver inspiring solutions including AI-powered citizen engagement and transparent policy tools. Successfully demonstrated how technology can create smarter, more inclusive governance while showcasing the incredible potential of AI-driven innovation in Indonesia's public sector.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and interesting projects.
